creator: michi@apache.org
text: After creating a new entry, it cannot be edited with the form wizard

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
it barfs on
RELAX NG Validation failed:
C:\src\cocoon-lenya\build\lenya\webapp\lenya\pubs\blog\work\oneformeditor\authoring\entries\2004\05\16\ewrerw\index.xml:14:59:
error: bad character content for element
C:\src\cocoon-lenya\build\lenya\webapp\lenya\pubs\blog\work\oneformeditor\authoring\entries\2004\05\16\ewrerw\index.xml:15:57:
error: bad character content for element
C:\src\cocoon-lenya\build\lenya\webapp\lenya\pubs\blog\work\oneformeditor\authoring\entries\2004\05\16\ewrerw\index.xml:16:61:
error: bad character content for element


    <echo:created>2004-05-16T16:07:46+02:00</echo:created>
    <echo:issued>2004-05-16T16:07:46+02:00</echo:issued>
    <echo:modified>2004-05-16T16:07:46+02:00</echo:modified>

which has the following relax ng schema:

      <element name="echo:created">

        <data type="NMTOKEN"/>
      </element>
      <element name="echo:issued">
        <data type="NMTOKEN"/>
      </element>
      <element name="echo:modified">
        <data type="NMTOKEN"/>
      </element>

NMTOKEN is defined as http://www.w3.org/TR/2000/WD-xml-2e-20000814#NT-Nmtoken

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: was NMTOKEN, should have been dateTime
